expo.name: Workout Calorie Tracker
expo.description: A mobile device application for IOS/Android that allows users to compile individual exercises into customized workouts. The application shows the calories burned for each exercise and the workout as a whole based on the times, the met values for each exercise, and the users weight. The workouts are saved into a cloud database under the users' name and can be marked as completed and edited to change the duration of each exercise within a workout.
